title: Shaw X Bear Tribute || "I'm just here for the dog" .
author: Watch Me Watch
comment: Shaw getting all jealous over Bear is the best!
Bear is such a good boy.

There were many love stories in this show. Reese and Jessica .  Finch and Grace.  

Shaw and Bear is the best one though.
How harold says "eet je ontbijt" is very funny ;)
That dog TOTALLY OWNED you people, like a BOSS!
description:
The only thing Shaw loved truly before she met Root was Bear the dog  =)
